When a download is complete, a popup stating that it is done is shown. While this popup is being drawn, Firefox become unresponsive if I have hardware acceleration enabled. If I disable hardware acceleration, it works just fine.


Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Make sure hardware acceleration is enabled
2. Download a file
3. Wait for it to complete.



The system is a Intel i5-2500K, H67-based motherboard and a ATI Radeon 5450 graphics card (driver version 8.812.0.0)
